text: #TheClergyChallenge. @bgcvaministries  No one tool alone is going to stop the #COVID19 pandemic. A combination of getting a COVID-19 #vaccine, wearing a mask, staying at least 6 feet away from others, and avoiding crowds are all needed. Learn more: https://t.co/ysEHezvBzm https://t.co/UzFXGP7yyL
